verses.verse: At the end <S%H7093><s%> of every seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a release. <S%H8059><s%>

This is the way <S%H1697><s%> of the release: <S%H8059><s%> every creditor <S%H4874><s%> shall release <S%H8059><s%> that which he has lent <S%H5383><s%> to his neighbor; <S%H7453><s%> he shall not exact <S%H5065><s%> it of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> and his brother; <S%H251><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s release <S%H8059><s%> has been proclaimed. <S%H7121><s%>
Of a foreigner <S%H5237><s%> you may exact <S%H5065><s%> it: <S%H251><s%> but whatever of your is with your brother your hand <S%H3027><s%> shall release. <S%H8058><s%>

However <S%H657><s%> there shall be no poor <S%H34><s%> with you; <S%H3068><s%> (for Yahweh will surely <S%H1288><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess it; <S%H3423><s%>)

if only you diligently <S%H8085><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all this commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day. <S%H3117><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, <S%H1696><s%> as he promised you: <S%H5670><s%> and you shall lend to many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> but you shall not borrow; <S%H5670><s%> and you shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> but they shall not rule over you. <S%H4910><s%>

If a poor man, <S%H34><s%> one <S%H34><s%> of your brothers, <S%H251><s%> is with you within any <S%H259><s%> of your gates <S%H8179><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H553><s%> you shall not harden your heart, <S%H3824><s%> nor shut <S%H7092><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> from your poor <S%H34><s%> brother; <S%H251><s%>

but you shall surely <S%H6605><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to him, <S%H5670><s%> and shall surely lend <S%H5670><s%> him sufficient <S%H1767><s%> for his need, <S%H4270><s%> which he lacks. <S%H2637><s%>

Beware <S%H8104><s%> that there not be a base <S%H1100><s%> thought <S%H1697><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The seventh <S%H7651><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> of release, <S%H8059><s%> is at hand; <S%H7126><s%>" and your eye <S%H5869><s%> be evil <S%H7489><s%> against your poor <S%H34><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> and you give <S%H5414><s%> him nothing; <S%H7121><s%> and he cry to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> against you, <S%H2399><s%> and it be sin to you.

You shall surely <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> him, <S%H3824><s%> and your heart shall not be grieved <S%H3415><s%> when you give <S%H5414><s%> to him; <S%H1558><s%> because that for this thing <S%H1697><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all your work, <S%H4639><s%> and in all that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hand to. <S%H3027><s%>

For the poor <S%H34><s%> will never cease <S%H2308><s%> out of <S%H7130><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> therefore I command <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> saying, You shall surely <S%H6605><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to your brother, <S%H251><s%> to your needy, <S%H34><s%> and to your poor, <S%H6041><s%> in your land. <S%H776><s%>

If your brother, <S%H251><s%> a Hebrew man, <S%H5680><s%> or a Hebrew woman, <S%H5680><s%> is sold <S%H4376><s%> to you, <S%H5647><s%> and serves you six <S%H8337><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> then in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> you shall let him go <S%H7971><s%> free from you. <S%H2670><s%>
When you let <S%H7971><s%> him go free <S%H2670><s%> from you, <S%H7971><s%> you shall not let him go empty: <S%H7387><s%>

you shall furnish <S%H6059><s%> him liberally <S%H6059><s%> out of your flock, <S%H6629><s%> and out of your threshing floor, <S%H1637><s%> and out of your winepress; <S%H3342><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> you shall give to him.

You shall remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were a bondservant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you: <S%H6680><s%> therefore I command you this thing <S%H1697><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>
It shall be, <S%H559><s%> if he tells you, <S%H3318><s%> "I will not go out from you; <S%H157><s%>" because he loves you and your house, <S%H1004><s%> because he is well with you; <S%H2895><s%>

then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> an awl, <S%H4836><s%> and thrust <S%H5414><s%> it through his ear <S%H241><s%> to the door, <S%H1817><s%> and he shall be your servant <S%H5650><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> Also to your female servant <S%H519><s%> you shall do likewise. <S%H6213><s%>

It shall not seem hard <S%H7185><s%> to you, <S%H5869><s%> when you let him go <S%H7971><s%> free <S%H2670><s%> from you; <S%H4932><s%> for to the double of the hire <S%H7939><s%> of a hireling <S%H7916><s%> has he served <S%H5647><s%> you six <S%H8337><s%> years: <S%H8141><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all that you do. <S%H6213><s%>

All the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> males <S%H2145><s%> that are born <S%H3205><s%> of your herd <S%H1241><s%> and of your flock <S%H6629><s%> you shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> you shall do no work <S%H5647><s%> with the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of your herd, <S%H7794><s%> nor shear <S%H1494><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of your flock. <S%H6629><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year <S%H8141><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> you and your household. <S%H1004><s%>

If it has any blemish, <S%H3971><s%> is lame <S%H6455><s%> or blind, <S%H5787><s%> or has any <S%H7451><s%> defect <S%H3971><s%> whatever, <S%H2076><s%> you shall not sacrifice it to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> it within your gates: <S%H8179><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat it alike, <S%H3162><s%> as the gazelle, <S%H6643><s%> and as the hart. <S%H354><s%>
Only you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> its blood; <S%H1818><s%> you shall pour <S%H8210><s%> it out on the ground <S%H776><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>
